shibboleth-desc: Provides authentication using Shibboleth in conjunction with PluggableAuth
shibboleth-wg-empty-displayname: The <var>wgShibboleth_DisplayName</var> configuration variable is empty in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-wg-empty-email: The <var>wgShibboleth_Email</var> configuration variable is empty in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-wg-empty-username: The <var>wgShibboleth_Username</var> configuration variable is empty in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-wg-empty-groupmap-attr: The <var>wgShibboleth_GroupMap</var> configuration variable is empty in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-attr-empty-username: Shibboleth: username attribute is not set
